question: who sings two pints of lager and a packet of crisps
vanilla_rag_result: The song "Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps" was performed by the band Splodgenessabounds. In the context of the sitcom "Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps," characters Donna Henshaw and Janet Keogh, played by Natalie Casey and Sheridan Smith, sang during a musical episode.
